ai-patthana15.26:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.26:0.3_0: Not for the sake of their wholesome roots,
ai-patthana15.26:1.1_0: Not cause or reasoning on account of a skillful teaching, they don’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.26:2.1_0: without cause or reason, without a reason,
ai-patthana15.26:4.1_0: The group of nine is finished.
